subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Scott Gomez and Sergei Brylin scored power-play goals 28 seconds apart in the third period last night to lead the Devils to a 2-1 victory against the visiting Atlanta Thrashers.
snippet: Scott Gomez and Sergei Brylin scored power-play goals 28 seconds apart in the third period last night to lead the Devils to a 2-1 victory against the visiting Atlanta Thrashers.
